text: Embrithopoda ("heavy-footed") is an order of extinct mammals from Asia, Africa and Eastern Europe. == Overview == Most of the embrithopod genera are known exclusively from jaws and teeth dated from the late Paleocene to the late Eocene; however, the order is best known from its terminal member the elephantine Arsinoitherium. Category:Mammals Category:Fossils
title: Embrithopoda
